00039 #include "DifferentialGeometry.h"
00040 
00041 DifferentialGeometry::DifferentialGeometry()
00042 : u(0.0), v(0.0), pShape(0)
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 DifferentialGeometry::DifferentialGeometry( const Point3D& P, const Vector3D& DPDU,
00047                         const Vector3D& DPDV, const Vector3D& DNDU,
00048                         const Vector3D& DNDV, double uu, double vv,
00049                         const TShape *sh )
00050 : point(P), u(uu), v(vv), pShape(sh), 
00051   dpdu(DPDU), dpdv(DPDV), dndu(DNDU), dndv(DNDV)
00052 {
00053     normal = Normal( Normalize( CrossProduct( dpdu, dpdv ) ) );
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 DifferentialGeometry::~DifferentialGeometry()
00058 {
00059 }
